original_text: He does not ask anyone to be his guide. Nobody can teach him the proper way to do things. Nobody can give him knowledge. Nobody can teach him how to understand things. He does not ask anyone to be his guide. Nobody can teach him the proper way to do things. Nobody can give him knowledge. Nobody can teach him how to understand things. He does not ask anyone to be his guide. Nobody can teach him the proper way to do things. Nobody can give him knowledge. Nobody can teach him how to understand things. He does not ask anyone to be his guide. Nobody can teach him the proper way to do things. Nobody can give him knowledge. Nobody can teach him how to understand things. He does not ask anyone to be his guide.
korean_text: 그가 누구와 더불어 의논하셨으며 누가 그를 교훈하였으며 그에게 정의의 길로 가르쳤으며 지식을 가르쳤으며 통달의 도를 보여 주었느냐

sentences.original_text: He does not ask anyone to be his guide.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 누구도 자신의 안내자가 되도록 요청하지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: Nobody can teach him the proper way to do things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 일하는 올바른 방법을 가르칠 수 있는 사람은 아무도 없습니다.
그에게 지식을 줄 수 있는 사람은 아무도 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: Nobody can teach him how to understand things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 사물을 이해하는 방법을 가르칠 수 있는 사람은 아무도 없습니다.
